item.title: Airbitz and Augur partner in virtual trading predictions
item.description:
Airbitz and Augur partner in virtual trading predictions

San Diego based Airbitz Inc., a leading blockchain, and data security-company, recently announced a partnership with Augur, a decentralized Ethereum-based prediction market. Do you think Hillary Clinton will win the presidency in November? Here is how Augur's market works. The purchase price of a share is $1.

item.title: Companies Are Stockpiling Bitcoin to Pay Off Cybercriminals
item.description:
Companies Are Stockpiling Bitcoin to Pay Off Cybercriminals

The rise of malware that holds data hostage has led companies to buy Bitcoin to use as ransom in case of an attack. Digital currency Bitcoin is variously promoted as an alternative to gold, a good way to make international transfers or the future of e-commerce.

item.title: Is Bitcoin at risk from miners leaving when the block reward is halved in July?
item.description:
Is Bitcoin at risk from miners leaving when the block reward is halved in July?

At the heart of Bitcoin is a process known as mining, adding transaction records to Bitcoin's public ledger. The ledger is made up of blocks of transactions linked in a chain, forming the widely touted technological breakthrough, the Blockchain. Individual blocks must contain a proof of work to be considered valid, Bitcoin uses the hashcash proof-of-work function.

item.title: FedCoin: When the Central Bank Copies Bitcoin
item.description:
FedCoin: When the Central Bank Copies Bitcoin

Digital currency advocates were invited to a private gathering in Washington with central bankers, convened by the Federal Reserve, the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank, as Bloomberg reported.

item.title: Bitcoin has been on an explosive rally - and it's back through $500
item.description:
Bitcoin has been on an explosive rally - and it's back through $500

Bitcoin is back. The cryptocurrency has been surging in US dollar terms over recent weeks, surging back through the $US500 mark, up around 170% from its lows of January last year. And in the past few weeks it has exploded by $US100 from the price on May 19th.

item.title: Bitcoin Mining-Here's What You Need to Know
item.description:
Bitcoin Mining-Here's What You Need to Know

Bitcoins are cash that you mine like gold. And thanks to the way bitcoins are minted, it's not too late to have bitcoins of your own. With a bitcoin now worth around $535.00 and the price fluctuating all the time, it might be a good time to consider the ins and outs and the pros and cons of bitcoin mining.

item.title: MtGox Victims Targeted by Bitcoin Theiving Scammers
item.description:
MtGox Victims Targeted by Bitcoin Theiving Scammers

MtGox victims are not having an easy time reclaiming their money back after the 2014 collapse. According to cybersecurity firm Cyren, customers are receiving spam messages claiming to help them recover their money.

item.title: Snowden: Anonymous 'Zcash' Could Solve Bitcoin Surveillance Risks
item.description:
Snowden: Anonymous 'Zcash' Could Solve Bitcoin Surveillance Risks

The world's most famous government whistleblower, Edward Snowden, last week referred to the anonymous cryptocurrency project Zcash as a solution to the surveillance risks of Bitcoin's public transaction record.

item.title: IRC meeting summary for 2016-06-02
item.description:
IRC meeting summary for 2016-06-02

Segwit review Compactblock testing CPFP status & other pending pull requests There aren't a lot of people interested in doing the softfork backports for 0.11 and there isn't a lot of user interest for it either. The backport of BIP68 is particularly complex and might be more dangerous than not doing a release at all.

item.title: You Can Now Trade Bitcoin and Ether in Canada!
item.description:
You Can Now Trade Bitcoin and Ether in Canada!

We are thrilled to announce the expansion of Gemini services to the Great White North! This is just the beginning of Gemini's international expansion and our tireless pursuit of building a world-class digital asset exchange with global reach. As of today, registered customers in Canada can trade bitcoin and ether on Gemini's ETH/BTC order book.
